page.title: Texas Instruments TMS320C54 Processor Options
page.subtitle: How would you like the Texas Instruments TMS320C54 processor module to analyze the input file?

checkbox.caption: Use I/O definitions
checkbox.help: If this option is on, IDA will use I/O definitions from the configuration file into a macro instruction.

checkbox.caption: Detect memory mapped registers
checkbox.help: If this option is on, IDA will replace addresses by an equivalent memory mapped register.
